member.name: T:RestWrapper.RestRequest
member.summary: RESTful HTTP request to be sent to a server.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Url
member.summary: The URL to which the request should be directed.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Method
member.summary: The HTTP method to use, also known as a verb (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, etc).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.User
member.summary: The username to use in the authorization header, if any.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Password
member.summary: The password to use in the authorization header, if any.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.EncodeCredentials
member.summary: Enable to encode credentials in the authorization header.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.IgnoreCertificateErrors
member.summary: Ignore certificate errors such as expired certificates, self-signed certificates, or those that cannot be validated.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.CertificateFilename
member.summary: The filename of the file containing the certificate.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.CertificatePassword
member.summary: The password to the certificate file.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Headers
member.summary: The HTTP headers to attach to the request.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ContentType
member.summary: The content type of the payload (i.e. Data or DataStream).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ContentLength
member.summary: The content length of the payload (i.e. Data or DataStream).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.StreamReadBufferSize
member.summary: The size of the buffer to use while reading from the DataStream and the response stream from the server.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ConsoleDebug
member.summary: Enable console debugging.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.#ctor(System.String,RestWrapper.HttpMethod,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: A simple RESTful HTTP client.
member.param: URL to access on the server.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Send
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with no data.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A string containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Send(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A byte array containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Send(System.Int64,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: The number of bytes to read from the input stream.
Stream containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with no data.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A string containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A byte array containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Int64,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: The number of bytes to read from the input stream.
A stream containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.summary: RESTful response from the server.

member.summary: The protocol and version.

member.summary: User-supplied headers.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ContentType
member.summary: The content type returned from the server.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ContentLength
member.summary: The number of bytes contained in the response body byte array.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ResponseURI
member.summary: The response URI of the responder.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP status code returned with the response.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.StatusDescription
member.summary: The HTTP status description associated with the HTTP status code.

member.name: F:RestWrapper.RestResponse.Data
member.summary: The stream containing the response data returned from the server.

member.summary: An organized object containing frequently used response parameters from a RESTful HTTP request.
